==== About Me ====
My name is Dairon Medina and i live in Cienfuegos, Cuba. I have been using Ubuntu since just after 8.04 was released. I have contributed to Ubuntu projects with Spanish Translations and have some personal projecs. Now im working on Open ERP modules for my country.

===== Community =====
I am currently an active member of the Cuban Comunity. Im a member and coordinator of my city LUG and also Cordinator of FLISOL install fest here.
